attributes.action: recognise the bravery of John Smeaton during the attempted car bombing of glasgow airport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BAA baggage handler John Smeaton single handedly  felled one of the suiside bombers as he tried to blow up the terminal building at glasgow airport, and we the public would like Mr brown to show our gratitude

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
